text.section: In any general election or special general election, a voter may write in a name for any office.

section.section: When requested by a voter, an election judge shall provide information on write-in voting.
If a voter requests information on write-in voting, an election judge shall assure that the voter is fully informed of the procedure before voting.
If a voter is unable to write, the voter may have assistance as provided in § 10-310(c) of this subtitle.
